pages.text: If you want to give me feedback and ideas or you have uploaded a video about my mod, you can contact me with the pages below, I would be very happy about that. $(br)$(li)$(l:https://legacy.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/nexus-battle-mode)Project Page$() $(li)$(l:https://discord.gg/ycRJJk8EXV)Discord Channel$()
